pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.11: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.14: “Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:1.16: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
